text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, az Alloh taolo va pajomʙar va korguzoron [-u farmondehoni musulmoni xud] itoat kuned va agar dar cize ixtilof karded, onro ʙa [Kitoʙi] Alloh taolo va [Sunnati] pajomʙar ʙozgardoned. Agar ʙa Alloh taolo va ruzi qijomat imon dored, [jaqin dosta ʙosed, ki] in [ʙozgast va Qur'onu Sunnat ʙarojaton] ʙehtar va xusfarcomtar ast
